word_mean: 偶生的，偶发的，后天的，获得的：非天生的，非遗传的
异位的：出现于正常位置以外的

sentence.Network_en: The strike was broken , of course, but mainly by a series of adventitious developments.
sentence.Network_cn: 罢工是中断了, 但主要还是由于发生了一系列意外事件.

sentence.Network_en: The adventitious root is triarch, and has the secondary structure.
sentence.Network_cn: 不定根为三原型, 具次生结构.

sentence.Network_en: Stem erect or floating, elongate, 5 - angled, nodes often with adventitious roots.
sentence.Network_cn: 茎直立或漂浮, 拉长, 5具角, 节通常具不定根的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... advent n 到来，出现 adventitious a 偶然的，不定的 convent n 女修道院.
Adventist 耶稣复临论者adventitious 偶然的adventive 外来的
1.2 根由种子(seed)胚根直接发育而成的根为主根(taproot),其余的为不定(adventitious)根,从这一点来讲,绝大多数人工栽培的猕猴桃植株仅有扦插而形成的不定根,只有野生.
adventitious species 外来种adventitious 外来的；偶然的；不定的adventive 非本地产的

list.abs: 1.按芽在枝上的位置，可分为定芽(normalbud)和不定芽(adventitious bud)。定芽又分为顶芽(terminalbud)和腋芽(axillary bud)。顶芽是生在主干或侧枝顶.
(2)种类:单倍体配子体无融合生殖(haploid gametophyte apomixes),二倍配子体无融合生殖(diploid gametophyte apomixes)和不定胚(adventitious embryo)三种。 1单倍.
英汉地质词典 - 豆丁网 ... advance 前进 adventitious plants 外来植物 adventive crater 寄生火口.
英语单词查询 ... adventitious root [植]不定根 adventitious species 侵入种, 外来种 adventitious vein (昆虫)偶生脉.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Latin adventicius 'coming to us from abroad' (from advenire 'arrive') + -ous(see also -itious)

means.word_mean: 1. associated by chance and not an integral part;

sentences.sentence: "poetry is something to which words are the accidental, not by any means the essential form"- Frederick W. Robertson
"they had to decide whether his misconduct was adventitious or the result of a flaw in his character"

auth_sentence.content: In the Banyan tree adventitious roots are frequently developed on the outstretched woody branches.
auth_sentence.res_content: In the Banyan tree adventitious roots are frequently developed on the outstretched woody branches.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In the Banyan tree adventitious roots are frequently developed on the outstretched woody branches.

stems_affixes.word_buile: advent来临+itious……的→突然来到的,偶然的
fact制作+itious……的→作出来的→不真实的

sentences.en: The strike was broken, of course, but mainly by a series of adventitious developments.
sentences.cn: 罢工是中断了, 但主要还是由于发生了一系列意外事件。
